data.expected_result: The discriminator appears right next to the truncation
data.short_description: In the friends list when someone's name gets truncated, on hover the discriminator won't appear right next to the name as on the desktop app [Browsers Only]
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord in a supported browser - Go to the friends tab - Have a friend with a long name, make sure it would get truncated - Hover over their name and observe where the discriminator is compared to the desktop app
